name: Doctor FF8
description:
Doctor FF8, this game was built using the Godot engine for DSOP's Hexcode Showdown Jam!
https://itch.io/jam/hexcode-showdown-jam


The game was created using all original assets.
Used Mixamo for the animations of the doctor.

Made by:
Trevor Stroud: 3d Modeling/Programming
Travis Sowle: Programming/Game planning
Arielle McMahon: Texturing
Scott Ballew: Sound Design
